cpl.readme: This plugin adds Syntax Highlighting for HTML tiddlers (text/html) to the [[CodeMirror|http://codemirror.net]] text editor. It needs the latest [[CodeMirror plugin|$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/codemirror]] to be installed
cpl.title: $:/plugins/tiddlywiki/codemirror-mode-htmlmixed
cpl.name: CodeMirror Mode HTML Mixed
cpl.description: HTML mixed highlighting mode for CodeMirror
title: Plugin_202303171602646
